text: Zaynab bint Ali (, ; 3 August 626682), was the daughter of the fourth Rashidun Caliph and the first Shia Imam Ali bin Abi Talib. She is the third child of Ali ibn Abi Talib and his wife Fatima. == Reference == Category:Female Sahabah Category:People from Medina Category:626 births Category:680s deaths
title: Zaynab bint Ali
